name: Matching Cards 01
description:
Hello!

This is my first game in a series of future games on my journey of game development.

The series will focus on creating basic and simple versions of game ideas, with intention to revisit and iterate on the previous versions of the games to add complexity/build skill sets for game development.

This entry is my first attempt at a very basic version of a matching-card game! ^_^

-------------

1. Controls - Point and Click cards with mouse

2. Audio    - The music within the game was accidentally created very quiet, to hear it you may need to increase your volume.

3. Score    - Score is given based on the time it takes for the player to solve the card matching game.

-------------

Thank you for your support!

- Nyari
